selectQuizTypeBeforeAlert: Select the quiz type before to proceed
inputTitleTooltip: Give a title to your quiz
inputDescriptionTooltip: Provide a description for your quiz
inputCoverUrlTooltip: Enter the URL of a image to use as quiz cover. Valid formats: .jpeg, .jpg, .gif, .png
addAnswerForQuestion: Add a possible answer for this question
inputQuestionAnswerValueTooltip: Enter a value for this answer
inputQuestionAnswerValueTrueOrFalseToolt: Choose if this answer is true or false
inputResultTitleTooltip: Enter a title for this result
inputResultValueTooltip: Enter a value corresponding a this result
inputResultValueTrueOrFalseTooltip: Enter a number or a range (ex.1-5) of true questions corresponding to this result
inputResultDescriptionTooltip: Enter the description for the result
inputResultImageUrlTooltip: Enter the URL of a image to use for this result. Valid formats: .jpeg, .jpg, .gif, .png
question: Question
whatQuizDoYouWantPlay: What quiz do you would play?
listQuizLabel: Go to list of available quizzes
loadQuizLabel: Load a quiz from a file
